name: Nam Manglak Spritzer
description: Nam manglak can be as simple as water, crushed ice, basil seed, and some sweetener. This is ever so slightly more gussied up: flavored with rose, lime, and honey, made effervescent by rosewater. It's an unbeatably refreshing combination for the hot sticky days to come.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 to 1 teaspoon lime juice, to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Divide sparkling water into two glasses, then basil seed. Stir well to coat basil seeds with water until jelly-like coatings form. Stir in honey, rosewater, and lime juice to taste. Serve with crushed ice.
